not just drag into farming just this way you must have an interest and capability to start that kind of farming that is very important thing because success or failure starts from that point second thing you which you need to consider you must have knowledge on what you want to farm people must start having questions oh dude oh i'm still i'm fair oh i'm not staying where i do farming how can i will help this is important in cost management hope you got what i mean right another important thing is good fun management this starts from the person or expert you're using from the equipment you're using from the inputs you're using all of these must be good and must be done correctly so make sure you invest much in good practice because when the fan practice not good you can just end up in getting losses which are not necessary for example when the farm is not clean you can just welcome some pests and diseases for example when you don't put all requirements for example seeds when you're not practicing on time when you not put fertilizers on time when not cut wet on time all of these will be problems so you must have a good farming practice starting from the good expert you are using so as to take care of your firm last but not least you must plan your market you must know how you deliver your products to the customer you must know who you are your target customers you must know how you will do your business how you sell your products and much more because when you're not planning you might just you obtain a lot of years but you don't know where to sell them so you just end in selling them by losses or buy cheap prices or many of the products might be rotten so in order to be a successful farmer you must do off of this but also be good in planning your market be good to know where you sell your products and whatever for today let's just end up hope you have just obtained something or you've got something might which might help you and until next time this is baba tv and this is bye bye man considering subscribing and hit the bell so as to be the member of this family till next time and have a nice day
